issue.title: [C++] Automatically convert from Substrait options to Arrow options object
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16482](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16482). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We want to expose all Arrow functions via the Arrow dialect of Substrait automatically.  The main task involved will be converting between Arrow's idea of "options" and Substrait's idea of "options".
